name: BACK TO THE EGG!
description:
BACK TO THE EGG! is a wild couch co-op base defense game for one to two players. Working as a team, you and your fellow dragonguard have to build a defense and fight a variety of angry monsters before they destroy the last found dragon egg. Every dragonguard weapon has got a variety of different skills which deal the most damage when they are combined correctly with your fellow's skills.

The Dragon Hachery Valles is in danger and only the strongest dragonguard can save it! In BACK TO THE EGG! players must work together to survive as many monster waves as possible.

Play solo or engage in wild, chaotic couch co-op for up to two players for an extra challenge. You’ll have to survie as long as possible to become the most effective and ultimate team!A DRAGONGUARDS QUEST
The Dragon Order got called to protect the last found dragon egg! Orcs and other creatures try to concuer the Dragon Hachery Valley and destroy it's egg.CHALLENGING
BACK TO THE EGG! is built up to be a hard challenge. You need to prepare each wave carefully and use your skills at the correct time. If you don't pay enough attention the monsters will definitely find a way to destroy the egg.

If you think you are smart enough and that you can stand the monster waves, become a part of the Dragon Order.
